text: Representatives for Oscar winner Jared Leto say that reports that he was attached to play Hugh Hefner in Brett Ratner ’ s biopic about the Playboy founder are false. “ Jared Leto is not and was not attached to a Brett Ratner directed Hugh Hefner film, nor will he be working with him in the future. Earlier reports were incorrect and not confirmed by his representatives, ” Leto ’ s reps said in a statement. A person familiar with the situation told TheWrap that the confusion stemmed from Ratner ’ s mention of being in talks with Leto at an event, but said that no official agreement was ever made.
